law.catch_line: Attorney General's duty with respect to violations by abortion facilities.
law.text: The Attorney General, upon certification by the secretary of the Cabinet for Health and Family Services, shall seek injunctive relief in a course of proper jurisdiction to prevent violations of the provisions of KRS Chapter 216B regarding abortion facilities or the administrative regulations promulgated in furtherance thereof in cases where other administrative penalties and legal sanctions imposed have failed to prevent or cause a discontinuance of the violation.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 78, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 582, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1998.
